channel.title: I got problem with my client (Please Help)
channel.description: I have Windows 7. And i have JDK (64 bit), Java (64 bit). No-ip, - bloodex.no-ip.info. And i have changed the ip on the client to mine. When i run the server and get on my client. The client wont loading. It just say: Connecting to Update server. But it never loading. I have tryed diff server & clients but it dont still works. Can anyone help me with this?

item.title: I got problem with my client (Please Help)

I have Windows 7. And i have JDK (64 bit), Java (64 bit). No-ip, - bloodex.no-ip.info. And i have changed the ip on the client to mine. When i run the server and get on my client. The client wont loading. It just say: Connecting to Update server. But it never loading. I have tryed diff server & clients but it dont still works. Can anyone help me with this?
